titles.title: He Is So Precious to Me

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For He is so precious to me, (so precious to me,) For He is so precious to me; (so precious to me;) 'Tis heaven below, my Redeemer to know, For He is so precious to me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I praise Him because He appointed a place Where, someday, through faith in His wonderful grace, I know I shall see Him, shall look on His face, For He is so precious to me.{/lang-eng}
